alert.note: Alert for Bryan; Bulloch; Chatham; Effingham (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 5:28PM EDT until July 24 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM EDT FOR PORTIONS OF BRYAN...BULLOCH...EFFINGHAM AND CHATHAM COUNTIES... At 528 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Meldrim, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include: Pooler, Godley Station, Bloomingdale, Blitchton, Pineora, Marlow, Eden, Meldrim and Ellabell. This warning includes I-16 between mile markers 139 and 155. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so.
